article: Why are you always tired, do you know? First, if we can't  _  well, we will be tired. But we are often too  _  . We can't finish our work in the day  _  we have to do it at night. We go to bed  _  and we get up early in the morning for school or work. Most people need at least eight  _  or some more. If we sleep for only five or six hours a night, we will be tired. Second, when we are ill, we will be tired. But we don't know we are ill. So if you are always tired, maybe you are not so  _  . You'd better go to see a  _  . Third, maybe you eat  too much  food, like hamburgers, meat, chocolate or coffee. If you are ill and tired after eating some food, please don't eat it  _  to see if you are well. At last, if the air around you isn't nice and clean, you will feel tired. So please open your windows often or go out for a walk and you will feel  _  .
